verses.verse: And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of this <S%H7892>song<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H5337>delivered<s%> him out of the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of all his <S%H341>enemies<s%>, and out of the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%>:
And he <S%H559>said<s%>, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is my <S%H5553>rock<s%>, and my <S%H4686>fortress<s%>, and my <S%H6403>deliverer<s%>;

The <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H6697>rock<s%>; in him will I <S%H2620>trust<s%>: he is my <S%H4043>shield<s%>, and the <S%H7161>horn<s%> of my <S%H3468>salvation<s%>, my high <S%H4869>tower<s%>, and my <S%H4498>refuge<s%>, my <S%H3467>saviour<s%>; thou <S%H3467>savest<s%> me from <S%H2555>violence<s%>.
I will <S%H7121>call<s%> on the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, who is worthy to be <S%H1984>praised<s%>: so shall I be <S%H3467>saved<s%> from mine <S%H341>enemies<s%>.
When the <S%H4867>waves<s%> of <S%H4194>death<s%> <S%H661>compassed<s%> me, the <S%H5158>floods<s%> of ungodly <S%H1100>men<s%> made me <S%H1204>afraid<s%>;
The <S%H2256>sorrows<s%> of <S%H7585>hell<s%> compassed me <S%H5437>about<s%>; the <S%H4170>snares<s%> of <S%H4194>death<s%> <S%H6923>prevented<s%> me;

In my <S%H6862>distress<s%> I <S%H7121>called<s%> upon the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H7121>cried<s%> to my <S%H430>God<s%>: and he did <S%H8085>hear<s%> my <S%H6963>voice<s%> out of his <S%H1964>temple<s%>, and my <S%H7775>cry<s%> did enter into his <S%H241>ears<s%>.

Then the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H1607%H1607>shook<s%> and <S%H7493>trembled<s%>; the <S%H4146>foundations<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> <S%H7264>moved<s%> and <S%H1607>shook<s%>, because he was <S%H2734>wroth<s%>.

There went <S%H5927>up<s%> a <S%H6227>smoke<s%> out of his <S%H639>nostrils<s%>, and <S%H784>fire<s%> out of his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H398>devoured<s%>: <S%H1513>coals<s%> were <S%H1197>kindled<s%> by it.
He <S%H5186>bowed<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> also, and came <S%H3381>down<s%>; and <S%H6205>darkness<s%> was under his <S%H7272>feet<s%>.
And he <S%H7392>rode<s%> upon a <S%H3742>cherub<s%>, and did <S%H5774>fly<s%>: and he was <S%H7200>seen<s%> upon the <S%H3671>wings<s%> of the <S%H7307>wind<s%>.
And he <S%H7896>made<s%> <S%H2822>darkness<s%> <S%H5521>pavilions<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> him, <S%H2841>dark<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%>, and thick <S%H5645>clouds<s%> of the <S%H7834>skies<s%>.
Through the <S%H5051>brightness<s%> before him were <S%H1513>coals<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H1197>kindled<s%>.
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7481>thundered<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and the most <S%H5945>High<s%> <S%H5414>uttered<s%> his <S%H6963>voice<s%>.
And he sent <S%H7971>out<s%> <S%H2671>arrows<s%>, and <S%H6327>scattered<s%> them; <S%H1300>lightning<s%>, and <S%H2000>discomfited<s%> them.

And the <S%H650>channels<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%>, the <S%H4146>foundations<s%> of the <S%H8398>world<s%> were <S%H1540>discovered<s%>, at the <S%H1606>rebuking<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, at the <S%H5397>blast<s%> of the <S%H7307>breath<s%> of his <S%H639>nostrils<s%>.
He <S%H7971>sent<s%> from <S%H4791>above<s%>, he <S%H3947>took<s%> me; he <S%H4871>drew<s%> me out of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%>;
He <S%H5337>delivered<s%> me from my <S%H5794>strong<s%> <S%H341>enemy<s%>, and from them that <S%H8130>hated<s%> me: for they were too <S%H553>strong<s%> for me.
They <S%H6923>prevented<s%> me in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of my <S%H343>calamity<s%>: but the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was my <S%H4937>stay<s%>.
He brought me <S%H3318>forth<s%> also into a large <S%H4800>place<s%>: he <S%H2502>delivered<s%> me, because he <S%H2654>delighted<s%> in me.
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1580>rewarded<s%> me according to my <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>: according to the <S%H1252>cleanness<s%> of my <S%H3027>hands<s%> hath he <S%H7725>recompensed<s%> me.
For I have <S%H8104>kept<s%> the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and have not wickedly <S%H7561>departed<s%> from my <S%H430>God<s%>.
For all his <S%H4941>judgments<s%> were before me: and as for his <S%H2708>statutes<s%>, I did not <S%H5493>depart<s%> from them.
I was also <S%H8549>upright<s%> before him, and have <S%H8104>kept<s%> myself from mine <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>.
Therefore the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H7725>recompensed<s%> me according to my <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>; according to my <S%H1252>cleanness<s%> in his eye <S%H5048%H5869>sight<s%>.
With the <S%H2623>merciful<s%> thou wilt shew thyself <S%H2616>merciful<s%>, and with the <S%H8549>upright<s%> <S%H1368>man<s%> thou wilt shew thyself <S%H8552>upright<s%>.
With the <S%H1305>pure<s%> thou wilt shew thyself <S%H1305>pure<s%>; and with the <S%H6141>froward<s%> thou wilt shew thyself <S%H6617>unsavoury<s%>.
And the <S%H6041>afflicted<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> thou wilt <S%H3467>save<s%>: but thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are upon the <S%H7311>haughty<s%>, that thou mayest bring them <S%H8213>down<s%>.
For thou art my <S%H5216>lamp<s%>, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H5050>lighten<s%> my <S%H2822>darkness<s%>.
For by thee I have <S%H7323>run<s%> through a <S%H1416>troop<s%>: by my <S%H430>God<s%> have I leaped <S%H1801>over<s%> a <S%H7791>wall<s%>.

As for <S%H410>God<s%>, his <S%H1870>way<s%> is <S%H8549>perfect<s%>; the <S%H565>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H6884>tried<s%>: he is a <S%H4043>buckler<s%> to all them that <S%H2620>trust<s%> in him.
For who is <S%H410>God<s%>, <S%H1107>save<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>? and who is a <S%H6697>rock<s%>, <S%H1107>save<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>?
<S%H410>God<s%> is my <S%H4581>strength<s%> and <S%H2428>power<s%>: and he <S%H5425>maketh<s%> my <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H8549>perfect<s%>.
He <S%H7737>maketh<s%> my <S%H7272>feet<s%> <S%H7737>like<s%> <S%H355>hinds'<s%> feet: and <S%H5975>setteth<s%> me upon my high <S%H1116>places<s%>.
He <S%H3925>teacheth<s%> my <S%H3027>hands<s%> to <S%H4421>war<s%>; so that a <S%H7198>bow<s%> of <S%H5154>steel<s%> is <S%H5181>broken<s%> by mine <S%H2220>arms<s%>.
Thou hast also <S%H5414>given<s%> me the <S%H4043>shield<s%> of thy <S%H3468>salvation<s%>: and thy <S%H6031%H6038>gentleness<s%> hath made me <S%H7235>great<s%>.
Thou hast <S%H7337>enlarged<s%> my <S%H6806>steps<s%> under me; so that my <S%H7166>feet<s%> did not <S%H4571>slip<s%>.
I have <S%H7291>pursued<s%> mine <S%H341>enemies<s%>, and <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> them; and turned not <S%H7725>again<s%> until I had <S%H3615>consumed<s%> them.
And I have <S%H3615>consumed<s%> them, and <S%H4272>wounded<s%> them, that they could not <S%H6965>arise<s%>: yea, they are <S%H5307>fallen<s%> under my <S%H7272>feet<s%>.
For thou hast <S%H247>girded<s%> me with <S%H2428>strength<s%> to <S%H4421>battle<s%>: them that rose <S%H6965>up<s%> against me hast thou <S%H3766>subdued<s%> under me.
Thou hast also <S%H5414>given<s%> me the <S%H6203>necks<s%> of mine <S%H341>enemies<s%>, that I might <S%H6789>destroy<s%> them that <S%H8130>hate<s%> me.
They <S%H8159>looked<s%>, but there was none to <S%H3467>save<s%>; even unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, but he <S%H6030>answered<s%> them not.

Then did I <S%H7833>beat<s%> them as small as the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, I did <S%H1854>stamp<s%> them as the <S%H2916>mire<s%> of the <S%H2351>street<s%>, and did spread them <S%H7554>abroad<s%>.

Thou also hast <S%H6403>delivered<s%> me from the <S%H7379>strivings<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%>, thou hast <S%H8104>kept<s%> me to be <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>: a <S%H5971>people<s%> which I <S%H3045>knew<s%> not shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> me.
<S%H1121%H5236>Strangers<s%> shall <S%H3584>submit<s%> themselves unto me: as soon as they <S%H8085%H241>hear<s%>, they shall be <S%H8085>obedient<s%> unto me.
<S%H1121%H5236>Strangers<s%> shall fade <S%H5034>away<s%>, and they shall be <S%H2296>afraid<s%> out of their close <S%H4526>places<s%>.
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2416>liveth<s%>; and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> be my <S%H6697>rock<s%>; and <S%H7311>exalted<s%> be the <S%H430>God<s%> of the <S%H6697>rock<s%> of my <S%H3468>salvation<s%>.
It is <S%H410>God<s%> that <S%H5414%H5360>avengeth<s%> me, and that bringeth <S%H3381>down<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> under me,

And that bringeth me <S%H3318>forth<s%> from mine <S%H341>enemies<s%>: thou also hast lifted me up on <S%H7311>high<s%> above them that rose <S%H6965>up<s%> against me: thou hast <S%H5337>delivered<s%> me from the <S%H2555>violent<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>.
Therefore I will give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto thee, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, among the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>, and I will sing <S%H2167>praises<s%> unto thy <S%H8034>name<s%>.

He is the <S%H4024%H1431>tower<s%> of <S%H3444>salvation<s%> for his <S%H4428>king<s%>: and <S%H6213>sheweth<s%> <S%H2617>mercy<s%> to his <S%H4899>anointed<s%>, unto <S%H1732>David<s%>, and to his <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>evermore<s%>.
